line.comment: * Mordan4 - reward for completing the renegades plot is 10% bonus across the board for all ship building.
* MordanA - The capital shipyard gets an extra 10% specialization level for ship building.
* from ZH 2.0 onwards crystals have become the 4th ship construction resource. Total ship prices +33%
* ZH 1.10 - OCV ship cost depends on abnormal signal strength
* Add-Ons 1.1: Specialization now has diminishing returns.
* Add-Ons 1.2: Discount is capped equal to the absolute maximum recycling factor.
* MordanA - These cost adjustments compensate specifically for the different population requirements these ships have.
* ships are already priced according to performance, but split require 20% more pop and paranid require 20% less pop, so that
* is a real pentalty/boon depending on the race. This is equalized somewhat here by making split ships slightly cheaper, and paranid slightly costlier.

sval.val: Mordan4 - reward for completing the renegades plot is 10% bonus across the board for all ship building.
MordanA - The capital shipyard gets an extra 10% specialization level for ship building.
from ZH 2.0 onwards crystals have become the 4th ship construction resource. Total ship prices +33%
ZH 1.10 - OCV ship cost depends on abnormal signal strength
Add-Ons 1.1: Specialization now has diminishing returns.
Add-Ons 1.2: Discount is capped equal to the absolute maximum recycling factor.
MordanA - These cost adjustments compensate specifically for the different population requirements these ships have.
ships are already priced according to performance, but split require 20% more pop and paranid require 20% less pop, so that
is a real pentalty/boon depending on the race. This is equalized somewhat here by making split ships slightly cheaper, and paranid slightly costlier.
